localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Around is a lightweight video collaboration tool that floats on your desktop, perfect for things like design sessions, brainstorms, and code reviews. Available for download. Now comes with EchoTerminator.
blogPost.body: Around is a lightweight video collaboration tool that floats on your desktop, perfect for things like design sessions, brainstorms, and code reviews. Available for download. Now comes with EchoTerminator.
blogPost.title: Around 2.0 - Video calls for the future of hybrid-remote work
blogPost.author: Garry Tan

localize.description: Around是一个轻量级的视频协作工具，漂浮在你的桌面上，非常适合设计会议、头脑风暴和代码审查等。可供下载。现在附带EchoTerminator。
localize.tagline: 视频呼唤混合-远程工作的未来。

localize.description: Around是一個輕量級的視頻協作工具，漂浮在你的桌面上，非常適合設計會議、頭腦風暴和代碼審查等。可供下載。現在附帶EchoTerminator。
localize.tagline: 視頻呼喚混合-遠程工作的未來。

previous.excerpt: 9 months after we initially launched on Chrome, Motion Firefox is finally here! Motion is an all-in-one time management tool that helps you get things done: by helping you maximize focus time, group meetings together, easily send availabilities, and focus.
previous.title: Motion Firefox - All-in-one time management tool in Firefox

localize.description: 在我们最初在Chrome浏览器上推出9个月后，Motion Firefox终于来了! Motion是一款集所有功能于一身的时间管理工具，它可以帮助你完成任务：通过帮助你最大限度地利用焦点时间，一起召开小组会议，轻松发送空闲时间，并集中精力。
localize.tagline: 火狐中的一体化时间管理工具

localize.description: 在我們最初在Chrome瀏覽器上推出9個月後，Motion Firefox終於來了! Motion是一款集所有功能於一身的時間管理工具，它可以幫助你完成任務：通過幫助你最大限度地利用焦點時間，一起召開小組會議，輕鬆發送空閒時間，並集中精力。
localize.tagline: 火狐中的一體化時間管理工具

next.excerpt: The priorities of workers are shifting. Unito compiled this toolkit to help kickstart your company’s growth in four important areas: remote work and flexible scheduling, diversity and inclusion, career growth and compensation, transparency and alignment.
next.title: The Better Workplace Toolkit  - Resources to help you meet the evolving needs of your team

localize.description: 工人们的工作重点正在发生变化。Unito编制了这个工具包，以帮助您的公司在四个重要领域启动发展：远程工作和灵活的时间安排，多样性和包容性，职业发展和薪酬，透明度和一致性。
localize.tagline: 帮助您满足团队不断变化的需求的资源。

localize.description: 工人們的工作重點正在發生變化。Unito編制了這個工具包，以幫助您的公司在四個重要領域啓動發展：遠程工作和靈活的時間安排，多樣性和包容性，職業發展和薪酬，透明度和一致性。
localize.tagline: 幫助您滿足團隊不斷變化的需求的資源。
